data.meanings: to protect, save, preserve, ward off, guard against evil and calamity, be secure, take as a shield, regard the duty. muttaqii - one who guard against evil and against that which harms and injures and is regardful of his duty towards human beings and God.
data.sentence: The word لِلْمُتَّقِينَ comes from the root و ق ي and is associated with the meanings: to protect, save, preserve, ward off, guard against evil and calamity, be secure, take as a shield, regard the duty. muttaqii - one who guard against evil and against that which harms and injures and is regardful of his duty towards human beings and God.

data.meanings: to remember/commemorate/recollect, study in order to remember, remind, bear in mind, mindful, mention/tell/relate, magnify/praise, admonish/warn (e.g. dhikra is the 2nd declenation and it is stronger than dhikr), preach, extol, give status.nobility/eminence/honour, fame, good report, cause of good reputation, means of exaltation.Male/man/masculine (dhakar, dual - dhakarain, plural - dhukur).
data.sentence: The word ذِكْرٌ comes from the root ذ ك ر and is associated with the meanings: to remember/commemorate/recollect, study in order to remember, remind, bear in mind, mindful, mention/tell/relate, magnify/praise, admonish/warn (e.g. dhikra is the 2nd declenation and it is stronger than dhikr), preach, extol, give status.nobility/eminence/honour, fame, good report, cause of good reputation, means of exaltation.Male/man/masculine (dhakar, dual - dhakarain, plural - dhukur).

data.meanings: to come back from, repent, set (stars), repeat, return (from disobedience to obedience), echo, alight at night.
data.sentence: The word مَءَابٍ comes from the root ا و ب and is associated with the meanings: to come back from, repent, set (stars), repeat, return (from disobedience to obedience), echo, alight at night.

data.meanings: To be handsome, make good, seem good or beautiful, be excellent.
data.sentence: The word لَحُسْنَ comes from the root ح س ن and is associated with the meanings: To be handsome, make good, seem good or beautiful, be excellent.
